title: OffshoreExchange
author: OffshoreExchange
content: Privacy is a fundamental right at the Offshore.ExchangeTrade with just your email address.Low 0.20% transaction fees. No KYC required.https://offshore.exchange/Why make a private exchange?Exchanges will FUD.The regulators will hunt.Crypto must be free.QuoteFor to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.-Nelson MandelaHow does an exchange respect and enhance the freedom of others?No KYCNo Tor/VPN IP blockingNo trading limitsNo withdraw limitsNo excuses for shotgun KYCNo excuses for freezing accountsDo you have your own token?NoDo you leverage customer coins?NoWhy should we trust you?1. Open source.2. Do not trust anyone. 3. Not your keys. Not your coins.4. Get in. Trade. Get out.What trading pairs are available?ADA/USDTCardanoUSD TetherAPE/USDTApeCoinUSD TetherAXS/USDTAxie Infinity ShardUSD TetherBCH/USDTBitcoin CashUSD TetherBNB/USDTBinanceUSD TetherBTC/USDTBitcoinUSD TetherCAKE/USDTPancakeSwapUSD TetherDOGE/USDTDogeUSD TetherETH/BTCEthereumBitcoinETH/USDTEthereumUSD TetherKLAY/USDTKlaytnUSD TetherLINK/USDTChainlinkUSD TetherLTC/USDTLitecoinUSD TetherMANA/USDTDecentralandUSD TetherMATIC/USDTPolygonUSD TetherPAXG/USDTPAX GoldUSD TetherSAND/USDTThe SandboxUSD TetherSHIB/USDTShiba InuUSD TetherSOL/USDTSolanaUSD TetherSUSHI/USDTSushiSwapUSD TetherTRX/USDTTronUSD TetherUNI/USDTUniswapUSD TetherXHT/USDTHollaExUSD TetherXLM/USDTStellarUSD TetherXMR/USDTMoneroUSD TetherXRP/USDTRippleUSD TetherWill you list new projects?Contact for listing.
